info.title: SevenRooms Concierge API
info.description:
# Introduction
The SevenRooms Concierge API is a RESTful API over HTTPS that utilizes JSON as the data response format. It allows application developers to query for data and perform actions, such as booking a reservation.

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

post.description: Create an API Authorization Token for making requests to the SevenRooms Reservations API.

200.description: JSON object containing an Authorization token that expires after 24 hours.

msg.description: Human‐readable message describing the response status.

token.description: Authentication token required to fulfill requests. Expires after 24 hours.

token_expiration_datetime.description: Date/Time when the token will expire

post.description: The `/begin_payment` endpoint is used when a customer is in the middle of the booking process that requires a prepayment guarantee. The `/begin_payment` endpoint will create the PaymentIntent on Stripe and fetches the PaymentIntent id and client_secret to be used together with your Stripe Publishable Key on the  moment of generating the credit card form using the Stripe SDK.

200.description: Object containing the setup intent information.

post.description: The `begin_save` endpoint is used when a booking requires a credit card guarantee (save cared for later). The `begin_save` is used to  create the SetupIntent on Stripe and fetches the SetupIntent id and client_secret to be used together with SevenRooms Stripe Publishable Key to be used generating the credit card form using the Stripe SDK.

200.description: Object containing the setup intent information.
An object containing all available **municipality_id** values and their associated Municipality names that a Concierge has venues in.
An object containing all available **municipality_id** values and their associated Municipality names.

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a paylink. Paylink can be used for instant charge and for saving client's card for later payments.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing paylink information.

get.description: Shows the list of created paylinks for the reservation.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing the list of created paylinks for the reservation.
Empty object if OK.

post.description: This endpoint calculates the prices associated with a reservation, including upsells if an integrator wants to incorporate that.

200.description: Object containing pricing information for the reservation. WARNING - The SevenRooms Reservations API is a dynamic JSON API, any response field may contain a null value.

upsells.description: Yummy meats and cheeses with jam
upsells.name: Charcuterie

description.example: Yummy meats and cheeses with jam

put.description: Book or Update a reservation at a Venue by a given Venue ID. When updating a reservation, a valid `reservation_id` is required.

200.description: Object containing the GUID of the created or updated Reservation.

get.description: Search Reservations by a given Concierge Group ID and an optional Concierge ID.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning date for date range filtering

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End date for date range filtering

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:
The `cursor` field can be used to get multiple pages based on the limit (max of 400). If there are more than the limit of results then the response will include the field `cursor`. 

The subsequent call will include the cursor field and SevenRooms responds with the next iteration of results and so on.

200.description: Object containing a list of Reservations.

results.booking_policy: Thank you for your reservation. Should your plans change, please let us know 24 hours before your reservation time. We look forward to serving you.
results.cancellation_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior.

booking_policy.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed. Booking policy should match what is expected based on the access rule setup. Could be set to the default venue policy, could be a custom policy, or if GFL, could be a policy from the policy bank.
booking_policy.example: Thank you for your reservation. Should your plans change, please let us know 24 hours before your reservation time. We look forward to serving you.

cancellation_policy.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed
cancellation_policy.example: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior.

check_numbers.description: Returned only when include_check_numbers is checked in the Concierge's API settings

onsite_payment.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

onsite_payment_gratuity.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

onsite_payment_net.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

onsite_payment_tax.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

onsite_payment_total.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

prepayment.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

prepayment_gratuity.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

prepayment_service_charge.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

prepayment_tax.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

prepayment_total.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

real_datetime_of_slot.description: If after midnight for a venue with a 6am “Start of Day” this field would have a date of date+1 compared to the date searched

request_id.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

status.description: The Reservation''s current status. Can be one of the following values (''On the Books'', ''Canceled'', ''No Show'', or ''Complete'').

status_code.description: The Reservation''s current status. Can be one of the following values (''RESERVED'', ''CANCELED'', ''NO_SHOW'', or ''COMPLETE'').

table_numbers.description: Returned only when include_table_numbers is checked in the Concierge's API settings

total_net_payment.description: Returned only when include_total_spend is checked in the Concierge's API settings

total_payment.description: Returned only when a reservation has been made/confirmed

get.description: Get a Reservation by a given Concierge Group ID ID and Reservation ID. The Reservation ID provided can be the SevenRooms generated Reservation ID or the External ID attached to the Reservation.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing a Reservation.

delete.description: Cancel a previously booked Reservation by a Concierge Group ID and Reservation ID.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing the Reservation ID

400.description: When a reservation cannot be found with the given reservation_id, SevenRooms will return 'Invalid reservation ID'. When a reservation has already been cancelled, SevenRooms will return 'Reservation has already been cancelled.' If the cancelation cut-off time has passed, SevenRooms will return 'Reservation cannot be modified after the cancellation cut-off time'.

404.description: When a venue doesn't have record of a reservation, SevenRooms will return 'The venue does not have record of this reservation.'

parameters.name: reservation_id

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

delete.description: Cancel a previously booked Reservation by a Concierge ID and Reservation ID.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing the GUID of the canceled Reservation.

400.description: When a reservation cannot be found with the given reservation_id, SevenRooms will return 'Invalid reservation ID'. When a reservation has already been cancelled, SevenRooms will return 'Reservation has already been cancelled.' If the cancelation cut-off time has passed, SevenRooms will return 'Reservation cannot be modified after the cancellation cut-off time'.

404.description: When a reservation cannot be found with the given reservation_id, SevenRooms will return 'The venue does not have record of this reservation.'

delete.description: Delete a previously booked Reservation based on Concierge ID and Reservation ID.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing the ID of the deleted Reservation

delete.description: Delete a previously booked Reservation based on Concierge Group ID and Reservation ID.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing the ID of the deleted Reservation

get.description: Get Availability for a Venue by a given Concierge ID and Venue ID.

parameters.name: party_size
parameters.description: Number of people for a reservation

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Custom duration in minutes. Used to calculate price for the slot if the `timeslot.charge_type` is `reservation_slot` OR `person_slot`.

parameters.name: supports_slot_options
parameters.description: Include multiple slots for the same time if set to True. Different slots belongs to different access rules. Only returns first available time slot if False.

parameters.name: include_payments_by_paylink
parameters.description: When true, availability includes paid timeslots for payment gateways that are not Stripe.

200.description: JSON list of Availability objects per shift. Each shift contains a `times` property with per time slot availability for the specified Venue.

timeslots.cancellation_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file

venue.name: The Marrow (DEMO)
venue.payment_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file.

booking_policy.description: Booking policy should match what is expected based on the access rule setup. Could be set to the default venue policy, could be a custom policy, or if GFL, could be a policy from the policy bank

cancellation_policy.example: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file

is_exclusive.description: Is this timeslot only available to a single concierge?

real_datetime_of_slot.description: If after midnight for a venue with a 6am “Start of Day” this field would have a date of date+1 compared to the date searched

slot_body_html.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_body_plaintext.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_name.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_option_id.description:
The access rule id.
This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_photo_large.description:
The url for the slot photo.
This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_photo_small.description:
The url for the slot photo.
This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_title.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

payment_policy.example: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file.

sevenrooms_public_key.description: SevenRooms Stripe Payment Gateway public key

get.description: (Beta) Get Date Range Availability for a Venue by a given Concierge ID and Venue ID.

parameters.name: party_size
parameters.description: Number of people for a reservation

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Custom duration in minutes. Used to calculate price for the slot if the `timeslot.charge_type` is `reservation_slot` OR `person_slot`.

parameters.name: supports_slot_options
parameters.description: Include multiple slots for the same time if set to True. Different slots belongs to different access rules. Only returns first available time slot if False.

parameters.name: days_out
parameters.description: Number that represent amount of days to query

200.description: Returns a JSON containing venue and Availability objects grouped by date. Each Availability contains a `times` property with per time slot availability for the specified date.

timeslots.cancellation_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file

put.description: Book a reservation hold for a specific time with an optional expiration time.

200.description:
Reservation Hold object

**WARNING: The SevenRooms Reservations API is a dynamic JSON API, any response field may contain a null value.**

reservation_hold_id.description: Unique identifier for a Reservation Hold

post.description: Release a previously created reservation hold

200.description: Object containing HTTP response status

get.description: Get Availability for a Venue or collection of Venues by a given Concierge ID and a list of Venue IDs.

parameters.name: party_size
parameters.description: Number of people for a reservation

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Custom duration in minutes. Used to calculate price for the slot if the `timeslot.charge_type` is `reservation_slot` OR `person_slot`.

parameters.name: supports_slot_options
parameters.description: Include multiple slots for the same time if set to True. Different slots belongs to different access rules. Only returns first available time slot if False.

parameters.name: venue_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of unique identifiers for a collection of Venues for which to query availability.

parameters.name: include_payments_by_paylink
parameters.description: When true, availability includes paid timeslots for payment gateways that are not Stripe.

parameters.name: venue_name
parameters.description: Name of the Venue for which to query availability.

200.description: JSON array of Availability objects per shift. Each shift contains a `times` property with per time slot availability for each Venue filtered by municipality.

timeslots.cancellation_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file

venue.name: The Marrow (DEMO)
venue.payment_policy: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file.

booking_policy.description: Booking policy should match what is expected based on the access rule setup. Could be set to the default venue policy, could be a custom policy, or if GFL, could be a policy from the policy bank

cancellation_policy.example: We ask that any cancellation to your reservation be made no less than 24 hours prior. For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file

is_exclusive.description: Is this timeslot only available to a single concierge?

real_datetime_of_slot.description: If after midnight for a venue with a 6am “Start of Day” this field would have a date of date+1 compared to the date searched

slot_body_html.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_body_plaintext.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

slot_name.description: This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

The access rule id.
This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

The url for the slot photo.
This property is only returned when support_slot_options=1 is passed in as a parameter to endpoint

get.description: Get Availability for all Venues a Concierge account has access to by a given Concierge ID.

parameters.description: Number of people for a reservation

parameters.name: duration

parameters.name: municipality_id
parameters.description: ID of the municpality to filter results by.

parameters.name: venue_name
parameters.description: Name of the Venue for which to query availability.

parameters.name: include_payments_by_paylink

put.description: Request a reservation at a venue by a given venue ID

200.description: Object containing the GUID of the created Reservation Request.

403.description: Concierge reservation requests setting is disabled for the venue.

get.description: Get a concierge reservation request at a venue by request ID

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Reservation Request

200.description: Object containing a Reservation Request

post.description: Update a concierge reservation request at a venue by a given request ID

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Reservation Request

200.description: Object containing the GUID of the updated reservation request.

post.description: Delete one or more concierge reservation request(s) at a venue by a given request ID

200.description: Object containing the GUID(s) of the deleted reservation request(s) (if deleted) and a count of how many objects were deleted.

get.summary: Get all experiences offers from a venue.
get.description: Retrieve a list of all experiences offers from a venue id.

200.description: Object containing a list of experiences.

get.summary: Get details of an experience offer from a venue.
get.description: Retrieve of a certain experience offers from a venue.

200.description: Object containing details of an experience.

post.description: Add concierge charge information for a charge conducted outside of the system. The `reservation_id` path parameter provided in the request may either be the Reservations `reservation_id` or the Reservations `reference_code`. Note that reference codes are only unique to a single venue unless venue prefixes are enabled for a Venue Group. If the Reservations `reference_code` is provided as the path parameter, a `venue_id` parameter is required.

parameters.name: reservation_id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier of the Reservation.

**Note:** The Reservation's `reference_code` can be used in place of the Reservation's `id`.

200.description: Object containing identifiers for the created Concierge Charge object

get.description: Retrieve a list of charges and refunds made in the system.

200.description: Object containing a Reservation Request
Object containing a list of Perks.

get.description: Retrieve all tags owned by a venue, including modified and default ones.

200.description: Object containing a list of Tags
JSON list of UpgradeCategory Objects.

get.description: Get details about an upgrade category

parameters.name: upgrade_category_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Upgrade Category

200.description: Details on an Upgrade Category

get.description: Get all Upgrades for an Upgrade Category at a Venue.

parameters.name: upgrade_category_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Upgrade Category

200.description: JSON list of Upgrade Objects.

400.description: Concierge does not exist, check concierge_id

404.description: No Upgrade Category found for the given upgrade_category_id.

get.description: Get an Upgrade at a Venue by a given Upgrade Category ID and Upgrade ID.

parameters.name: upgrade_category_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Upgrade Category

200.description: Upgrade Object.

400.description: Concierge does not exist, check concierge_id

404.description: No Upgrade Category found for the given upgrade_category_id.

get.description: Retrieve a specified Venue by ID.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date-time passed in when concierge has venues with blackouts. Not commonly used.

parameters.name: municipality_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Municipality to search for Availability within.

200.description: Object containing the retrieved Venue.

data.name: The Marrow
data.payment_policy: For no shows or late cancellations, you will be subject to fee of $25 per person that will be applied to the credit card on file.

ExternalAPIKeySecurity.description: An Authorization `token` received in the response body of the request to the `/auth` endpoint.
ExternalAPIKeySecurity.name: Authorization

client_id.description: Unique ID for your API Audience.

client_secret.description: Unique secret for your API Audience.

amount.description: The total amount in cents. Example: 200

first_name.description: Client's first name. Required when creating reservation, must be excluded for update.

last_name.description: Client's last name. Required when creating reservation, must be excluded for update.

phone.description: Phone number of the Client in [E-164 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164). For more information on this attribute please find our guide [here](https://concierge-api-docs.sevenrooms.com/developer-portal/phone-number-guide/). Required when creating reservation, must be excluded for update.

reservation_hold_id.description: Unique identifier of the previously booked Reservation Hold. If booking succeeds, the system will release this Hold.

reservation_id.description: Unique identifier of the previously booked Reservation. If provided, the system will discard the Reservation when calculating availability to place the Reservation Hold.

internal_notes.description: Internal notes for the venue staff.

send_client_email.description: Send the client an email confirmation

send_client_sms.description: Boolean field used to send the client a SMS confirmation. Requires client phone number and venue must have SMS messaging enabled to work.

mf_ratio_male.description: Number of males in the party

mf_ratio_female.description: Number of females in the party

perk_id.description: ID of perk to book with this reservation

payment_instrument_token.description: intent_id returned by the payments endpoints begin_payment and begin_save

payment_subtotal.description: In cents. This is required only for payment flow

payment_gratuity.description: In cents. This is required only for payment flow

payment_service_charge.description: In cents. This is required only for payment flow

payment_tax.description: In cents. This is required only for payment flow

external_user_id.description: ID for 3rd-party user foreign key to this reservation.

duration.description: Custom duration in minutes. Note this will override shift defaults

table_codes.description: Table number (if a table combination, comma-delimited)

reservation_tags.description: Comma delimited list of reservation tags in category:tag format

client_tags_to_add.description: Comma delimited list of client tags in category:tag format

client_tags_to_remove.description: Comma delimited list of client tags in category:tag format

access_persistent_id.description: persistent_id of the access_rule you want to validate for the reservation

payment_by_paylink.description: Boolean, true if you need to create the auto-cancel paylink

paylink_note.description: Add the note to paylink, will be visible to the guest

paylink_email.description: Client's email. The paylink will be sent to that email.

seated_time.description: Date and time when clients arrived in ISO 8601 format

source_first_name.description: First name of the source user

source_last_name.description: Last name of the source user

source_phone.description: Phone number of the source user

send_client_email.description: Send the client an email confirmation
Send the client an email confirmation

shift_persistent_id.description:
Unique identifier of the Shift belonging to this Reservation.      
> Concatenation of:      
> - Venue ID      
> - Shift Category      
> - Timestamp when shift was created      
>       
> Note that Venue ID may contain dashes.

access_persistent_id.description:
Unique identifier for access as a result of the availability call for the given time slot.      

Access persistent ID from result of availability call for given time slot.

reservation_id.description: Unique identifier of the previously booked Reservation. If provided, the system will discard the Reservation when calculating availability to place the Reservation Hold.

hold_wait_time_sec.description: Amount of time, in seconds, until the waitlist hold expires. Default is 300.

shift_persistent_id.description:
Unique identifier of the Shift belonging to this Reservation.      
> Concatenation of:      
> - Venue ID      
> - Shift Category      
> - Timestamp when shift was created      
>       
> Note that Venue ID may contain dashes.

time.description: Additional time field for exact arrival time

internal_notes.description: Internal notes for the venue staff.

duration.description: Custom duration in minutes. Note this will override shift defaults.

mf_ratio_male.description: Number of males in the party

mf_ratio_female.description: Number of females in the party

send_client_email.description: Send the client an email confirmation

external_user_id.description: ID for 3rd-party user foreign key to this reservation

source_first_name.description: First name of the source user

source_last_name.description: Last name of the source user

source_phone.description: Phone number of the source user

internal_notes.description: Internal notes for the venue staff.

duration.description: Custom duration in minutes. Note this will override shift defaults

mf_ratio_male.description: Number of males in the party

mf_ratio_female.description: Number of females in the party

send_client_email.description: Send the client an email confirmation

external_user_id.description: ID for 3rd-party user foreign key to this reservation

request_ids.description: List of request IDs to delete. You can pass as a comma-separated string (e.g., 'request-id-1,request-id-2') or a list of strings (e.g., ['request-id-1', 'request-id-2'])

transaction_id.description: Charge transaction ID in gateway or source system

subtotal.description: Subtotal of charge amount before taxes, gratuities, and fees. Must be a non-zero, positive value

card_id.description: ID of the tokenized card in the source system

card_brand.description: Brand of the tokenized/stored card (if applicable)

upsell_amount.description: Total amount of upsells on the specific charge

promo_code_id.description: Identifier of the promo code used on the charge

promo_discount_amount.description: Promotion discount amount applied on the charge

total.description: Total of the charge after taxes, gratuities, and fees. Must be a non-zero, positive value

skip_validation.description: Boolean value to skip validation on the concierge charge or not

reservation_hold_id_path.description: Unique identifier of the previously booked Reservation Hold.
reservation_hold_id_path.name: reservation_hold_id
